item.title: Open Letter to U.S. Ambassador to China Nicholas Burns Regarding Human Rights and Peaceful Protest
item.description: Date sent: December 11, 2023, 21:38 (China Standard Time) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-11-open-letter-to-ambassador-nicholas-burns.pdf On LinkedIn: On X (Twitter): Open letter to @USAmbChina Dear Ambassador Burns, I recently read your statement on International Human Rights Day 2023 with great interest and appreciation, particularly given my own experiences with human rights violations in China. Having endured what could only be… pic.twitter.com/VX9rppPIir — Vincent B. Le Corre (@VincentBLeCorre) December 11, 2023

Having endured what could only be… pic.twitter.com/VX9rppPIir — Vincent B. item.title: Open Letter to French Foreign Office Minister Catherine Colonna, French Ambassador to China Bertrand Lortholary, Consul General Guillaume Roy, forwarded to Ambassador Burns and U.S. Attorney General Merrick Garland
item.description: Date sent: December 11, 2023, 13:53 (China Standard Time) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-11_1353_0800_open_letter_to_colonna_lortholary_Redacted.pdf On LinkedIn: On X (Twitter): I am publicly sharing an open letter addressed to French Foreign Affairs Minister Catherine Colonna (@MinColonna), Ambassador to China Bertrand Lortholary (@BLortholary), and Consul General Guillaume ROY. This letter concerns a deeply serious matter: the possibility of being… pic.twitter.com/iuTu24tC1n — Vincent B. Le Corre (@VincentBLeCorre) December 11, 2023

item.title: I tell the FBI that I want to help them understand one of the biggest frauds in history, the frauds committed by McDonald’s Corporation and their accomplices
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-02-07_1334_0800_fbi_I_want_to_help_you_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: Mr. Rogalski, I want to help you understand one of the biggest fraud in history Date sent: February 7, 2023 at 13:34 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department) Cc: Edward Lehman Note: since Assistant Legal Attaché Adam Rogalski told me on 2021-09-20 that he was “one of the FBI representatives,” I assume that this communication was transfered to the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI).

item.title: Email sent on 2022-12-31 to the U.S. Ambassador to China
item.description:
FROM : [REDACTED]

TO : Nicholas BURNS, United States Ambassador to China

SUBJECT: Open letter to Mr. Nicholas Burns and to the U.S. Ambassador to China

DATE: 2022-12-31 at 01:36 Beijing time

item.title: Email sent on 2022-05-12 to the F.B.I. and CCed to the U.S. Ambassadors to France and to China
item.description:
On 2022-05-12, I sent an email to the F.B.I. and CCed it to Denise BAUER, U.S. Ambassador to France, and Nicholas BURNS, U.S. Ambassador to China.

FROM : X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

TO : Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

CC : Denise Bauer (U.S. Ambassador), Nicholas Burns (U.S. Ambassador), [REDACTED: the email was CCed to three additional people]

SUBJECT: I shared a folder with the FBI containing evidence

DATE: 2022-05-12 at 23:20 Beijing time

item.title: Email sent to Adam ROGALSKI (State Department, FBI) and Mahonri MANJARREZ (FBI) in which I give examples of the serious frauds the transnational criminal enterprise McDonald’s Corporation and/or its affiliated companies committed.
item.description:
Key point of this event: the F.B.I. is now formally notified of some of the crimes I am accusing McDonald’s Corporation and/or its subsidiary companies of.

On 2022-03-11, I sent 3 emails to the F.B.I.

This is the third email which was sent at 19:38 Beijing time. It was sent to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez.

From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

To: Adam Rogalski (Legal Attaché/State Department), Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI language specialist)

Subject:: 3 concrete examples of aggravated frauds
